mapper.insert: insert into tar_grp ( TAR_GRP_NAME, TAR_GRP_DESC, TAR_GRP_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values ( #{tarGrpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tarGrpDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tarGrpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tar_grp set TAR_GRP_NAME = #{tarGrpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAR_GRP_DESC = #{tarGrpDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAR_GRP_TYPE = #{tarGrpType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TAR_GRP_ID = #{tarGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select TAR_GRP_ID, TAR_GRP_NAME, TAR_GRP_DESC, TAR_GRP_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from tar_grp where TAR_GRP_ID = #{tarGrpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select TAR_GRP_ID, TAR_GRP_NAME, TAR_GRP_DESC, TAR_GRP_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from tar_grp
